title: G20 Summit 2023 LIVE Updates: Metro services at Supreme Court station to be affected, all others to remain operational
selftext:
China's foreign ministry confirmed that President Xi Jinping will not attend the G20 Summit in Delhi. Instead, Premier of the State Council Li Qiang will attend the 18th G20 Summit. Special arrangements have been made across the national capital in the wake of the G20 Summit.
